title: Blair and the Defeat of Separatism

content.question: Which of the following later became an example of Tony Blair’s reference to “defeat the separatism” referenced in the passage?

choices.label: The 2009 creation of the Supreme Court of the United Kingdom
The 2011 legislation to fix the term lengths of the House of Commons to five years
The 2014 referendum on independence for Scotland

content.answer: The 2014 referendum on independence for Scotland

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the author's argument or perspective relates to political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
